alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southwest Big Horn Basin; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 1:58PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Hot Springs and central Fremont Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 157 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Anchor Dam to Fort Washakie. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ethete around 215 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Milford, Lander and Hudson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lander Foothills; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southwest Big Horn Basin; Wind River Basin
